name: privacy-data-protection
description: Use when identifying data privacy and protection laws that apply to your software product. Covers GDPR, CCPA/CPRA, LGPD, PIPL, PIPA, DPDPA, PIPEDA, and other global privacy regulations with jurisdiction mapping, key obligations, and compliance triggers.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) Official Text
